content.html: I learned about a wild bug today, boy howdy. Get ready: JIRA has a known bug where if you are pasting text from Excel into the search bar, it attaches an image to an unrelated ticket to the one you're browsing on.
content.value:
I learned about a wild bug today, boy howdy.  
Get ready: 
JIRA has a known bug where if you are pasting text from Excel into the search bar, it attaches an image to an unrelated ticket to the one you're browsing on.
